meanings.sent1: She arrived contemporarily with her friend at the party.

meanings.sent1: Contemporarily, people prefer online shopping over traditional methods.
meanings.sent2: The technology used in smartphones is contemporarily advanced.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed contemporarily with the sound of the doorbell.

meanings.definition: Existing or occurring at the same time
meanings.sent1: The contemporarily designed building blended well with the historic surroundings.
meanings.sent2: The two contemporarily published books discussed similar themes.
meanings.sent3: The twins wore contemporarily styled outfits, causing confusion at the party.
meanings.sent4: His contemporarily decorated office reflected his innovative approach.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed contemporarily created art pieces alongside ancient artifacts.
